easy: Recycle or repurpose something in the room you’re in.
Drink using a 'reusable' item (even if it’s silly, like a pen).
Do 10 squats while naming 5 items you can compost.
medium: Name 3 ocean animals that are endangered.
Pick an object near you and improvise a recycling PSA about it.
Convince someone to turn off a light that's on unnecessarily.
Try to say the word 'sustainability' in five different accents.
Act out how you feel when someone wastes water.
hard: Do a 'sustainability cheer' using 3 buzzwords.
Sing a line from a song using the words 'climate change.'
Make up a rap about saving the planet.
Take a 'green' selfie and post it with a funny caption.
Pretend to be a tree and make everyone hug you.
Share a sustainability tip like you're a TikTok influencer.

easy: Never have I ever left the tap running while brushing my teeth.
Never have I ever left lights on when leaving a room.
Never have I ever used plastic utensils.
Never have I ever used a plastic straw.
Never have I ever bought bottled water instead of using a reusable one.
medium: Never have I ever driven when I could have walked or biked.
Never have I ever printed out something I could’ve just read digitally.
Never have I ever thrown recyclables in the trash.
Never have I ever used a single-use coffee cup.

Never have I ever thrown batteries in the trash.
